about_the_game:
Due to cruel governing policies and corrupt noblemen, a rebellion is beginning to unfold in Hozuki.

Byakuya, the rebel organization that fights the shogunate, has recruited many of the strongest warriors in the land, and all of them have a grudge against the shogunate.

The shogunate's elite fighting force, Hozuki, is home to the only ones that can stand against them. Mukuro, Momo, and Kinako must do battle to win true peace for Yamato once and for all!


Interrogate the locals to find important hints about the nature of your enemies!

Fight in turn-based battles as you explore all over the country of Yamato!

Swap between two characters, both of whom have unique abilities in battle, at various points in the story!








Beautiful Animation
Combat animations are hand-drawn in an anime style, giving attacks their own flavor!

Choose Your Side
Fight with the government, join the rebellion, or fight for yourself! The decision is yours.

A Fully Expanded Experience
Includes all the bonus content introduced after the original release in Japan, with new battles to fight and new relationships to explore!

Voice-Acted Female Cast
All the female characters are voiced, enhancing the emotion of the story!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: The land of Yamato is filled with cruel rebels, oppressive nobles, and dangerous monsters. Fight as a Hozuki samurai to bring justice to the land!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
